name: Devin Booker
description: 6'5" shooting guard, known for his scoring prowess and smooth offensive game. Calm demeanor, silky smooth jumper, and a knack for hitting tough shots.

booker-shimmy.name: The Booker Shimmy
booker-shimmy.description: Shoulder shimmy after hitting a tough shot.
booker-shimmy.prompt: Devin Booker performing his signature shoulder shimmy - slight smirk on his face, hands pointing upwards, having just hit a difficult shot, crowd roaring in background, subtle flex.

fadeaway-jumper.name: Fadeaway Jumper
fadeaway-jumper.description: Booker's textbook fadeaway, nearly impossible to guard.
fadeaway-jumper.expression: intense focus, locked in on the basket
fadeaway-jumper.prompt: Devin Booker executing a perfect fadeaway jumper - body leaning back at a sharp angle, shooting arm fully extended with perfect follow-through, defender reaching but unable to contest, determined look in his eyes, ball leaving his fingertips.

finger-gun.name: Finger Guns Celebration
finger-gun.description: Celebrating a big play with finger guns.
finger-gun.prompt: Devin Booker celebrating a clutch play by shooting imaginary finger guns towards the bench or crowd - big smile on his face, playful gesture, high energy, contagious enthusiasm, team mates celebrating with him.

driving-layup.name: Driving Layup
driving-layup.description: Strong drive to the basket, finishing with a layup.
driving-layup.prompt: Devin Booker driving hard to the basket for a layup - body low and explosive, ball securely in hand, eyes locked on the rim, defender trailing behind, showing the speed and finesse.

sideline-strut.name: Sideline Strut
sideline-strut.description: Confident strut down the sideline after a timeout.
sideline-strut.prompt: Devin Booker casually strutting down the sideline during a timeout - head held high, cool and collected demeanor, wearing team warmups, subtle swagger, radiating confidence, fans cheering in the background.
